DESCRIPTION_SECTION.TITLE: Description
PARRAGRAPHS: Bioclimatic pergolas are the latest innovation in solutions for gardens and terraces. Designed to provide shade and regulate the temperature of your outdoor area without the need for complex works or installations.

The intelligent system of bioclimatic pergolas prevents the greenhouse effect, constantly renewing the air and avoiding heat accumulation. Additionally, their watertight slats allow you to enjoy the outdoors even on rainy or snowy days, thanks to a drainage system that prevents water from accumulating.

We offer models with integrated LED lighting, ideal for creating the perfect atmosphere at any time of day. Moreover, the high-quality aluminum structure is robust and elegant, with hidden screws for a clean and modern aesthetic.
